I agree. This error No gradients provided for any variable is not informative. Would be ideal to show the node that caused the error.

Here's what I'm trying to do

  # logits is the output of a forward-pass
  positive_indices = tf.greater(logits[:, 0], 0.0)
  positive_returns = tf.select(positive_indices, train_labels_node, -train_labels_node)
  loss = 1.0 - tf.reduce_sum(positive_returns) / BATCH_SIZE

  optimizer = tf.train.MomentumOptimizer(learning_rate,
                                         0.9).minimize(loss,
                                                       global_step=batch)

body:
I agree. This error `No gradients provided for any variable` is not informative. Would be ideal to show the node that caused the error.

Here's what I'm trying to do

```
  # logits is the output of a forward-pass
  positive_indices = tf.greater(logits[:, 0], 0.0)
  positive_returns = tf.select(positive_indices, train_labels_node, -train_labels_node)
  loss = 1.0 - tf.reduce_sum(positive_returns) / BATCH_SIZE

  optimizer = tf.train.MomentumOptimizer(learning_rate,
                                         0.9).minimize(loss,
                                                       global_step=batch)
```
